name: Alpha Yek
movement: 30 feet climbing and walking speed, enabling quick maneuverability in various terrains.
description: The Alpha Yek is a medium fiend with a menacing appearance, showcasing exceptional agility and strength, complemented by its natural armor.
memorable: Its ability to use bone shards as both weapons and as lingering damaging effects makes it a unique threat.
goals: Typical goals include seeking dominance in combat and overwhelming foes through tactical teamwork.
relations: Often found accompanying other fiends or malevolent creatures, cooperating in attacks.
environment: Commonly encountered in dark, chaotic, or corrupted landscapes.
strengths: High mobility, effective in combat with strong physical attacks, and resilient to many damage types.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical effects if it fails saving throws despite its magic resistance.
attacks: The Alpha Yek employs bite and claw attacks with significant damage output, enhanced by its ability to utilize bone shards for continual damage.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance, which grants the Alpha Yek advantage on saves against spells, significantly enhancing its survivability.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception score of 15, allowing it to navigate and detect hidden threats in low-light conditions.
skills: Proficient in stealth, with a +7 modifier, making it highly capable in sneaky approaches and ambushes.
additional_information: Has the Magic Resistance ability, providing notable defense against spellcasters.
Employs Pack Tactics, granting advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
Carries bone shards, which can inflict additional damage over time.
Good physical stats grant robust capabilities in grappling and combat maneuvers.
Well-suited for ambush tactics in combat scenarios.
test_queries: agile fiend with bone shard attacks
